function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

const groupDatas = [];
let infoData = [];
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{get_key(String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);

            let key;
